name: Tom'sHiveTemperature
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blue skies
des: Temperature of the hive is provided by a DS18B20, outside temp and humidity is from a BME280 connected to a ESP-12f on battery and solar power reporting to test.mosquitto.org every 5mins.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
